original: MEYEB-BECKHTJS, Franz, Direktör, Landskrona, f Altona Hamburg 27/1 83, gm Rosalie Striker. Hdlssk.utb o tekn stud Tyskl. Anst Nord hartslimfabr i Lkr 01—04, Tyskl 05—11, grund Sv limämnesfabr i Lkr (d första i sitt slag i Skand) 11, sed. 22 ens inneh av o dir f denna num t AB omb fma, i vilk av Nord hartslimfabr uppg, deläg Finska lim-ämn.fabr Hfors. Styr.led S Sv fabrikantfrb Malmö. FI sakk.uppdr åt myndigh o branseh-org. Resor: Flert europ länd.
translated: MEYEB-BECKHTJS, Franz, Director, Landskrona, born in Altona Hamburg on January 27, 1883, married to Rosalie Striker. Completed trade school and technical studies in Germany. Worked at the Northern Heart Glue Factory in Landskrona from 1901 to 1904. Moved to Germany from 1905 to 1911. Founded the Swedish Adhesive Material Factory in Landskrona in 1911, the first of its kind in Scandinavia. Currently the sole owner and director of this company, which is a subsidiary of the Northern Heart Glue Factory. Also a part-owner of the Finnish Adhesive Material Factory in Helsinki. Serves on the board of the South Swedish Manufacturers Association in Malmö. Has been assigned various tasks by authorities and industry organizations. Has traveled extensively throughout several European countries.

structured.name: Franz Meyeb-Beckhtjs
